title: Revenue earned from sports merchandise worldwide 2006 to 2015
yAxis: Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
In general Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.

Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, gradually decreasing from 2007 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2014, and finally roughly constant from 2014 to 2015.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 21.26 was reported at Year 2008
Minimum Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 17.57 was reached at Year 2011
